member.name: T:vsocasm.CommandLine.AliasArgument
member.summary: Argument that acts as an alias for another argument.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The argument this alias should mirror.

member.summary: Gets the value of this argument.

member.name: M:vsocasm.CommandLine.AliasArgument.SetValue``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets the value for this argument.

member.name: P:vsocasm.CommandLine.AliasArgument.DefaultValue
member.summary: The default value that will be used if no value was passed on the command line.
member.remarks: Using this when is set will have no effect.

member.name: P:vsocasm.CommandLine.AliasArgument.IsRequired
member.summary: Flag indicating whether this argument is required, i.e. must be provided via the command line.

member.name: M:vsocasm.CommandLine.AliasArgument.Validate(System.Object)
member.returns: true if is valid; otherwise false.

member.summary: The default value that will be used if no value was passed on the command line.

member.name: P:vsocasm.CommandLine.Argument.IsRequired
member.summary: Flag indicating whether this argument is required, i.e. must be provided via the command line.

member.name: P:vsocasm.CommandLine.Argument.Processor
member.summary: A method that can be executed when the command line arguments are processed.

member.summary: A method that can be used to validate a value for this argument.

member.name: M:vsocasm.CommandLine.Argument.Validate(System.Object)
member.returns: true if is valid; otherwise false.

member.name: M:vsocasm.CommandLine.Argument.Process
member.summary: Process the value by executing the associated processor function.

member.param: Command line arguments to process. This is usally coming from your Main method.
